short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add UTM parameters to Kajabi links, auto-detect campaign details, customize UTM values, and pass contact info via URL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kajabi Link Optimizer is a must-have extension for Kajabi users who want to take their marketing efforts to the next level. With this extension, users can easily add UTM parameters to their links, which can help them track and analyze the effectiveness of their marketing campaigns.

One of the key features of the extension is its ability to automatically detect email campaign ID, Subject, and Internal title, which saves users time and effort. Users can also customize or insert their own UTM values, which gives them even more control over their marketing analytics.

But that's not all â€“ Kajabi Link Optimizer also allows users to pass the contact name and email ID with the URL parameters, which can help personalize their marketing efforts and create a more engaging experience for their subscribers.

Overall, Kajabi Link Optimizer is an essential tool for any Kajabi user who wants to optimize their marketing efforts and get the most out of their campaigns. Whether you're a seasoned marketer or just starting out, this extension is a must-have for anyone looking to take their Kajabi marketing to the next level.
